entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 a.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 6:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
Temperature: 9.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 8.2°C
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers this morning. Rain at times heavy beginning this morning. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h. High 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
